trans-unit.source: This extension touchs each table and field of the current database. So be careful. It works for me without any problems. But please: Make a database backup before you work with this extension.
To work with a UTF-8-based TYPO3-installation I prefer to set following settings with the installtool:
Here you see a list of all tables with there included fields of the current database. Red marked tables/fields are not set to your choice and can be changed with the next click on DB->UTF8.
